pr_title: Make public src/main classes final where possible.

timeline.message: Make public src/main classes final where possible.

timeline.bodyText: Don't think I'm too sad to lose this check
timeline.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: endpoint isn't allowed to start with http:// btw
timeline.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: I would expose a package protected getter for testing, to keep the logic that all members should be private final when possible.
timeline.author: bogdandrutu
bogdandrutu

timeline.bodyText: This are great test, but why adding them in a PR that says it does make things final?
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: Without the spy (can't because of final), we lose a significant test that the key-value splitting logic is correct (a regression test since it was broken for a while).
replies.author: anuraaga
